Question
========

A researcher wants to examine the effect of a school intervention on numeracy, controlling statistically for age differences among students. What analysis technique is appropriate for this purpose? 
Answerlist
----------
* Single linear regression analysis
* One-way analysis of variance ('One-way ANOVA')
* Two-way analysis of variance ('Two-way ANOVA')
* Covariance analysis (ANCOVA)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
